summary: After experiencing what they think are a series of "break-ins", a family sets up security cameras around their home, only to realize that the events unfolding before them are more sinister than they seem.
cast: David Bierend|Brian Boland|Molly Ephraim|Katie Featherston|Seth Ginsberg|Sprague Grayden|William Juan Prieto|Jackson Xenia Prieto|Micah Sloat|Vivis Colombetti
keywords: no music|supernatural horror|found footage|ends with text|text narration
title: Paranormal Activity 2
